titleStmt.title: Some seasonable and modest thoughts, partly occasioned by, and partly concerning the Scots East-India Company humbly offered to R.H. Esq., a member of the present Parliament / by an unfeigned and hearty lover of England.
titleStmt.author: C. K., Unfeigned and hearty lover of England.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
